channel.title: 法新社
channel.description: 这是一个追踪法新社news的种子

item.title: 在葡萄牙西南部的乡村小镇圣特奥托尼奥，印度和尼泊尔餐馆比葡萄牙餐馆还多。
item.description:
In Sao Teotonio, a small country town in southwest Portugal, there are more Indian and Nepalese restaurants than Portuguese ones.

It makes sense when you discover South Asian workers keep the fruit farms that are the mainstay of this region going https://t.co/JQf93pwYxZ

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 8, 2024

item.title: #澳大利亚大堡礁正在发生 "大规模白化事件"：管理局
item.description:
#BREAKING 'Mass bleaching event' under way at Australia's Great Barrier Reef: Authority pic.twitter.com/vC2fHkqryg

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 7, 2024

item.title: 法国总统埃马纽埃尔-马克龙的一位特使表示，法国将在军政府统治下的乍得继续驻军，因为在与其他军事政权发生危机后，法国将撤退到非洲其他地方。
item.description:
France will keep troops in junta-run Chad as it retreats elsewhere in Africa following crises with other military regimes, an envoy for French President Emmanuel Macron said https://t.co/9bhov1E3OE pic.twitter.com/oC5tEAvqSh

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 7, 2024

item.title: 到 20 世纪 70 年代，澳大利亚北部地区约 98% 的野生咸水鳄鱼数量已经消失。现在，有超过 10 万条 "咸水鳄 "在澳大利亚的海岸和湿地捕食。
item.description:
By the 1970s, some 98 percent of the wild saltwater crocodile population had disappeared in Australia's Northern Territory.

Now, over 100,000 "salties," which can grow over six meters long and weigh more 2,200 pounds, hunt along its coasts and wetlands https://t.co/vs3Eo8dzXk pic.twitter.com/oxNaZqvlRt

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 7, 2024

item.title: 当世界上第一颗原子弹在距离他家门口 25 英里的地方爆炸时，韦斯利-伯里斯正在床上熟睡。
item.description:
Wesley Burris was fast asleep in bed when the world's first atomic bomb exploded just 25 miles from his front door.

Ignored by "Oppenheimer," atomic test victims are speaking out https://t.co/viWwbixO0J pic.twitter.com/99aRqoW1HB

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 7, 2024

item.title: #BREAKING Haiti requires 'global response' like Gaza, Ukraine：美国官员

#BREAKING Haiti requires 'global response' like Gaza, Ukraine: US official pic.twitter.com/zJX0DbFyPq

item.title: 乌克兰任命瓦列里-扎卢日尼（Valery Zaluzhny）为新任驻英国特使，这是他被解除国家总司令职务一个月后的事。
item.description:
Ukraine has named Valery Zaluzhny as its new envoy to the UK, a month after he was removed from his position as the country's commander-in-chief https://t.co/TKEKnWBWC7

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 7, 2024

item.title: 在印度海得拉巴的拉德巴扎市场，一名售货员正在查看一排漆手镯。#AFP 📸@noahseelam

A salesman looks at a row of lacquered bangles at the Lad Bazaar market in Hyderabad, India. #AFP

item.title: 塞内加尔有望于 3 月 24 日举行大选--结束因即将卸任的总统麦基-萨勒推迟投票而引发的数周危机
item.description:
Senegal looks set to hold elections on March 24 — ending weeks of crisis triggered by outgoing President Macky Sall's delay of the poll https://t.co/36tDpdHWCT pic.twitter.com/OsYT8krP2c

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 7, 2024

item.title: 委内瑞拉已邀请欧盟派遣一个小组观察 7 月 28 日举行的总统选举，外界普遍预计尼古拉斯-马杜罗总统将在选举中谋求连任。
item.description:
Venezuela has invited the European Union to send a team to observe presidential elections on July 28 in which President Nicolas Maduro is widely expected to seek another term https://t.co/myVme8NUVS pic.twitter.com/YACTWrw3Gs

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 7, 2024

item.title: 被伴侣殴打或恐吓的科特迪瓦妇女在该国唯一一家为家庭虐待受害者提供综合支持的庇护所中获得了独立和自尊
item.description:
Ivorian women who are beaten or intimidated by their partners are gaining independence and self-esteem in the country's only refuge to offer integrated support for domestic abuse victims https://t.co/EQzgRcap0b pic.twitter.com/UQZBlxaIp5

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 7, 2024

item.title: 美国中央银行行长在华盛顿对立法者表示，只要当前的经济趋势继续下去，美国联邦储备委员会将在今年开始降息。
item.description:
The US Federal Reserve will start cutting interest rates this year so long as current economic trends continue, the head of the US central bank told lawmakers in Washington https://t.co/AVotwbDxtL pic.twitter.com/2j1NRsvUgh

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 7, 2024

item.title: 美国总统乔-拜登正在为其政治生涯中最关键的时刻之一做准备，他将发表国情咨文演讲，旨在说服持怀疑态度的选民相信这位 81 岁的总统适合在 11 月的大选中击败唐纳德-特朗普。
item.description:
US President Joe Biden is preparing for one of the most critical moments of his political career, with a State of the Union speech aimed at convincing skeptical voters the 81-year-old is fit to beat Donald Trump in November's election https://t.co/ZflsIBrLfB pic.twitter.com/sNYJAh18bx

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 7, 2024

item.title: 据法国几个主要政党的领导人称，埃马纽埃尔-马克龙总统周四表示，在俄罗斯入侵乌克兰两年后，法国将不排除支持乌克兰的任何选择。
item.description:
President Emmanuel Macron on Thursday said France would not rule out any option to support Ukraine two years into Russia's invasion, according to the leaders of several major French political parties https://t.co/A8M5vKZY5F pic.twitter.com/qf3dtp30kn

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 7, 2024

item.title: #海地主要港口运营商称因暴力事件暂停服务

item.title: 与塞内加尔许多与世隔绝的聋人社区一样，52 岁的马梅-马萨尔-法耶（Mame Massar Faye）一直在为独自投票而苦苦挣扎。 现在，聋人选民将有一个共同的词汇来讨论政治，并了解在选举日到来时应该做些什么 @AFP
item.description:
Like many in Senegal's isolated deaf community, 52-year-old Mame Massar Faye has always struggled to vote by himself.

Now, deaf voters will share a common vocabulary to discuss politics and learn what to do when election day comes around @AFP https://t.co/C3MzL2p0gQ

— Alice Chancellor (@a__chancellor) March 7, 2024

item.title: ⚠️ 在非洲和亚洲，拥有白皙的皮肤往往与较高的地位、特权和美丽联系在一起。为了减少皮肤中的黑色素，许多人求助于不规范的面霜和美白针。但是，这些都可能是危险的，@WHO 警告说，它们会对人体造成危害。
item.description:
⚠️ In Africa and Asia, having fair skin is often associated with higher status, privilege and beauty.

In their quest to reduce the melanin in their skin, many turn to unregulated creams and skin-whitening jabs. But these can be dangerous, with the @WHO warning they pose a… pic.twitter.com/u9m3o5bMqK

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 5, 2024

item.title: #据一位高级官员称，美国的目标是通过在加沙沿岸建立一个港口来增加向巴勒斯坦人提供的援助，这一重大行动预计不会涉及美国在当地的军事人员。
item.description:
#UPDATE The United States aims to increase aid deliveries to Palestinians by establishing a port on Gaza's coast, in a major operation that is not expected to involve American military personnel on the ground, according to a senior official https://t.co/0L8YExbYB2

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 7, 2024

item.title: #在俄罗斯入侵乌克兰的阴影下，瑞典于周四成为北约第 32 个成员国，翻过了两个世纪不结盟的历史，结束了两年的艰难外交历程
item.description:
#UPDATE Sweden on Thursday became the 32nd member of NATO in the shadow of Russia's invasion of Ukraine, turning the page on two centuries of non-alignment and capping two years of torturous diplomacy https://t.co/9VvzEYBv32 pic.twitter.com/91pOaXmFJ9

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 7, 2024

item.title: #在哈马斯代表团对以色列的立场表示不满并离开开罗后，美国驻以色列大使周四表示，加沙停战谈判尚未 "破裂"，➡️。
item.description:
#UPDATE Talks for a truce in Gaza have not yet "broken down", the US ambassador to Israel said on Thursday, after a Hamas delegation voiced dissatisfaction with Israel's positions and left Cairo ➡️ https://t.co/6KYv88mNJT pic.twitter.com/R5lza76syg

item.title: 视频：🇿🇦 南非小镇从鸵鸟羽毛中掘金从掸子到羽毛围巾，全球约 70% 的鸵鸟产品产自南非。生产者说，羽毛的多功能性使他们得以生存。
item.description:
VIDEO: 🇿🇦 South African town sees gold in ostrich plumes

From dusters to feather boas, about 70% of ostrich products globally originate from South Africa. Producers say the feathers' versatility has allowed them to survive.

📹 @julie__bourdin
📷 Gianluigi GUERCIA#AFPVertical pic.twitter.com/uIUqV8VbCt

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 7, 2024

item.title: #最新消息 欧洲中央银行（ECB）周四再次冻结利率，暂不开始降息，因为行长克里斯蒂娜-拉加德（Christine Lagarde）表示，官员们对实现该行通胀目标的进展还没有 "足够的信心" ➡️
item.description:
#UPDATE The European Central Bank (ECB) froze interest rates again on Thursday, holding off from starting to cut as president Christine Lagarde said officials were not yet "sufficiently confident" on progress towards the bank's inflation goal ➡️ https://t.co/cNPKlhf2Zh pic.twitter.com/ItXxVJLzRl

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 7, 2024

item.title: 周四，德国数十万乘客面临出行困境，因为铁路和机场工人举行了新一轮罢工，以支持提高工资的要求 ➡️
item.description:
Hundreds of thousands of passengers in Germany faced travel misery on Thursday as rail and airport workers staged new strikes to back demands for higher wages ➡️ https://t.co/tXoqVVWgry pic.twitter.com/x8lPYzCsWb

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 7, 2024

item.title: 一名接近调查此事的消息人士周四向法新社证实，红牛车队已将指控 F1 车队老板克里斯蒂安-霍纳行为不当的女员工停职 ➡️ #AFPSports
item.description:
Red Bull have suspended the female employee who accused the F1 team boss Christian Horner of inappropriate behaviour, a source close to the investigation into the matter confirmed to AFP on Thursday ➡️ https://t.co/fWH3WI1QYd #AFPSports pic.twitter.com/iJoHewk5Nu

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 7, 2024
